channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Let Copilot Coding Agent handle the busy work】让Copilot编码代理处理繁忙的工作
item.description: 【The GitHub Copilot Coding Agent changes how .NET developers get work done. Beyond inline suggestions, it can analyze your repo, plan multi‑step tasks, create issues and pull requests, and carry changes across projects—all in the cloud. In this post, we’ll show two concrete scenarios using the eShopLite sample: automatically creating miss】GitHub副副代理改变了.NET开发人员完成工作的方式。除了内联建议之外，它可以分析您的回购，计划多步骤任务，创建问题并提取请求，并在项目中进行更改 - 所有这些都在云中。在这篇文章中，我们将使用Eshoplite样本显示两个具体方案：自动创建MISS

item.title: 【What's new in Azure AI Foundry | August 2025】Azure AI Foundry中的新功能| 2025年8月
item.description: 【TL;DR Models: GPT‑5 family now in Azure AI Foundry (gpt‑5 requires registration; launch regions: East US 2, Sweden Central). Also new: Sora API updates (image→video, inpainting; Global Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central), Mistral Document AI (OCR), Black Forest Labs FLUX.1 Kontext [pro] and FLUX1.1 [pro],】TL; DR模型：现在在Azure AI铸造厂的GPT -5家族（GPT -5需要注册；发射区域：East US 2，瑞典Central）。也是新的：Sora API更新（图像→视频，inpain; East US 2和Sweden Central的全球标准），Mistral文档AI（OCR），Black Forest Labs Flux.1 Kontext [Pro] [Pro]和Flux1.1 [Pro]，

item.title: 【How can I write a C++/WinRT IAsyncOperation where T is not a Windows Runtime type?, part 1】如何编写C ++/Winrt iaSyncoperation 其中 t 不是Windows运行时类型？，第1部分
item.description: 【I often get asked about how one could use C++/WinRT's IAsyncOperation<T> where T is not a Windows Runtime type. The T in IAsyncOperation<T> must be a Windows Runtime type because the algorithm for generating an interface ID for IAsyncOperation<T> work】我经常被问到如何使用C ++/Winrt的iasyncoperation <t>其中T不是Windows运行时类型。 iAsyncoperation <t>中的t必须是Windows运行时类型

item.title: 【Unlocking Vector Search with OneLake Indexer and OpenAI Integration in Microsoft Fabric】使用Onelake索引器和Microsoft Fabric中的OpenAI集成解锁矢量搜索
item.description: 【Our team works with customer solutions that integrate AI into data solutions. Some time ago, this post titled Fabric Change the Game: Unleashing the Power of Microsoft Fabric and OpenAI for Datase】我们的团队与将AI集成到数据解决方案中的客户解决方案合作。一段时间以前，这篇名为Fabric Change Game的帖子：释放Microsoft Fabric的功能和DATASE的OpenAI的功能

item.title: 【PowerToys 0.94 is here: Settings search, shortcut conflict detection and more!】PowerToys 0.94在这里：设置搜索，快捷冲突检测等等！
【Dubious security vulnerability: Remembering passwords for recently-opened ZIP files】可疑安全漏洞：记住最近开放的邮政编码文件的密码
item.description: 【A security vulnerability report arrived that claimed that it could obtain unauthorized access to a password-protected ZIP file by the following means: Start with a password-protected ZIP file, call it "secret.zip". Create a dummy ZIP file and give it the same password. Call this file "attack". Open atta】安全漏洞报告到达，声称它可以通过以下方式获得未经授权对受密码保护的ZIP文件的访问：从密码保护的ZIP文件开始，将其称为“ necret.zip”。创建一个虚拟zip文件，并提供相同的密码。称此文件为“攻击”。公开Atta

item.title: 【Boost Your Copilot Collaboration with Reusable Prompt Files】通过可重复使用的提示文件来增强您的副驾驶协作
item.description: 【Writing effective prompts for AI tools can be time-consuming and challenging. Cement those efforts by leveraging reusable prompt files. These custom prompts allow for quick access at the prompt box, and they’re automatically stored and shared with your teammates to make it easy to multiply your Copilot s】为AI工具编写有效的提示可能是耗时且具有挑战性的。 通过利用可重复使用的提示文件来解决这些努力。 这些自定义提示允许在提示盒中快速访问，并且它们会自动存储并与队友共享，以使您可以轻松地将副驾驶S乘

item.title: 【Enriching Microsoft 365 profiles with Microsoft 365 Copilot connectors for people data (public preview)】使用Microsoft 365 Copilot连接器来丰富Microsoft 365配置文件（公共预览）
item.description: 【In today’s workplace, employee data lives across multiple systems – HR databases, talent platforms, directories – making it hard to get a complete view of a person. Microsoft 365 Copilot connectors for people data (now in public preview) tackle this challenge by bringing external people data into Microsoft 365. A Mi】在当今的工作场所中，员工数据跨越了多个系统（人力资源数据库，人才平台，目录），因此很难完全了解一个人。 Microsoft 365 Copilot连接器用于人员数据（现在在公共预览中）通过将外部人员数据带入Microsoft 365来应对这一挑战。

item.title: 【Thoughts on creating a tracking pointer class, part 16: Second attempt to use a list】关于创建跟踪指针类的想法，第16部分：第二次尝试使用列表
item.description: 【Commenter LB pointed out that you can use the splice method to move nodes between lists. So let's try that. The idea is that each tracking_ptr holds an iterator to a list node that is part of】评论者LB指出，您可以使用剪接方法在列表之间移动节点。所以让我们尝试一下。这个想法是每个Tracking_ptr都将迭代器保存到列表节点的一部分

item.title: 【Microsoft Graph Toolkit retirement】Microsoft Graph Toolkit退休
item.description: 【We are announcing the deprecation of the Microsoft Graph Toolkit (MGT). The retirement period begins September 1st, 2025 with full retirement planned for August 28th, 2026. Why we’re retiri】我们宣布Microsoft Graph Toolkit（MGT）的弃用。退休期开始于2025年9月1日，计划于2026年8月28日全额退休。为什么我们要退休
